Class PDXObjectImage

java.lang.Object
  org.pdfbox.pdmodel.graphics.xobject.PDXObject
      org.pdfbox.pdmodel.graphics.xobject.PDXObjectImage
All Implemented Interfaces:
COSObjectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PDCcitt, PDJpeg, PDPixelMap
public abstract class PDXObjectImage
extends PDXObject

The prototype for all PDImages.

Version:
$Revision: 1.9 $
Author:
Ben Litchfield, mathiak
